Articles.Content:
Here is my problem. I have a TON of mods, but i sometimes want to see the parts from a mod only. the 'Manufacter' tab in stock ksp only works with those who had created an agency. if the mod doesn't include an agency, it doesn't show only the mod parts. 

Please tell me which mods can show only the parts from especific mods.

Thank you all ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
There's no such mod AFAIK, but you can create a custom category and place mod parts there.

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104231](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104231)

You still need to make configs for each mod, but it comes with several and they're easy to write. Just a matter of adding a filter that checks the folder name. And they're moduleManager configs, so you can store them in any directory in gamedata and not have them changed when the mod updates! I store all my MM configs in a folder of my own, including these filters.

> 
> [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104231](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104231)
> You still need to make configs for each mod, but it comes with several and they're easy to write. Just a matter of adding a filter that checks the folder name. And they're moduleManager configs, so you can store them in any directory in gamedata and not have them changed when the mod updates! I store all my MM configs in a folder of my own, including these filters.

And the manufacturer tab is automatically sorted by GameData folder ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
